desc: 魔神の瞳に埋め込まれている水晶

dictionary.lore: The large crystallized eye of a demon which inhabited Ishgria. Called the "Artificial Black Eye" by some, this eye has the ability to convert any light it absorbs into energy. When this demonic eye is equipped, it is said to boost the combat abilities of the wearer to the maximum. However, since not much is known about this otherworldly material, it is very difficult to obtain in its purest form.

name: 漆黒の義眼
